title: Vertex Media high-end black-and-white multi-page agency website

requirements.text: Create a cohesive visual design system for the Vertex Media marketing site that matches a high-end, cinematic, minimal aesthetic: black/white base, bold typography, clean grid-based layout, confident professional tone, and consistent spacing/typography rules across all pages.

quotes:
Tone: Confident, ambitious, professional, growth-driven.
Design: Black and white base, bold typography, clean layout, cinematic visuals, minimal but strong.

acceptanceCriteria: All pages share a consistent header, footer, typography scale, and spacing system.
Primary and secondary buttons are visually consistent across pages.
No default/unstyled template UI remains (overall look feels intentionally designed).

requirements.text: Implement site-wide navigation and routing for the following pages: Home, Services, About, Join Our Network, Contact. Include a header nav and a footer with nationwide positioning and social links.

quotes:
Pages needed:

Home

Services

About

Join Our Network

Contact

acceptanceCriteria: Each page is reachable via header navigation without full page reload.
Footer appears on all pages and includes social link placeholders (e.g., Instagram, LinkedIn, YouTube).

requirements.text: Build the Home page with: (1) a strong hero headline, (2) the exact tagline “From Coast to Coast, We Capture It All”, (3) prominent CTA buttons labeled “Book a Shoot” and “Join the Network”, (4) a short authority section about expanding nationwide and building a curated network, (5) a services overview section, and (6) a portfolio preview section.

quotes:
Home

Strong hero headline

Tagline

“Book a Shoot” and “Join the Network” buttons

Short authority section about expanding nationwide

Services overview

Portfolio section

acceptanceCriteria: Tagline text matches exactly: “From Coast to Coast, We Capture It All”.
Both CTAs are visible above the fold on typical desktop widths.
Home includes distinct sections for authority, services overview, and portfolio preview.

requirements.text: Create the Services page with clearly presented service offerings: Sports Media Production, Athlete Highlights, Brand Content, Event Coverage, Monthly Retainers, Nationwide Contributor Network. Each service should have concise, confident copy consistent with the brand tone.

quotes:
Services

Sports Media Production

Athlete Highlights

Brand Content

Event Coverage

Monthly Retainers

Nationwide Contributor Network

acceptanceCriteria: All six services are listed and easy to scan (cards/sections).
Copy reads as a national agency offering (not a local freelancer).

requirements.text: Create the About page emphasizing: (1) the vision to scale coast to coast, (2) structured systems and quality control, and (3) built-for-growth positioning. Keep the tone confident and ambitious.

quotes:
About

Vision to scale coast to coast

Structured systems + quality control

Built for growth

acceptanceCriteria: About page includes explicit messaging for all three bullets (vision, systems/quality, growth).
Layout remains minimal, bold, and high-end consistent with the design system.

requirements.text: Create the Join Our Network page with contributor-focused messaging that emphasizes curated approvals and national opportunity, plus a contributor application CTA that opens or displays an application form (name, email, location/market, specialties, portfolio link, short message).

quotes:
Join Our Network

Contributor application CTA

Emphasize curated approvals + national opportunity

acceptanceCriteria: Join Our Network page clearly communicates curated approvals and national opportunity.
Application form includes fields: name, email, location/market, specialties, portfolio link, message.
Submitting the form shows a success confirmation state in the UI.

requirements.text: Create the Contact page with: (1) an inquiry form (name, email, company/organization optional, project type, desired date optional, budget range optional, message), (2) messaging about nationwide operations, and (3) social links.

quotes:
Contact

Inquiry form

Nationwide operations

Social links

acceptanceCriteria: Contact page includes the inquiry form, nationwide operations message, and social link placeholders.
Submitting the inquiry form shows a success confirmation state in the UI.

requirements.text: Implement backend persistence for form submissions: store Contact inquiries and Join Network applications in the Motoko canister with timestamps. Expose canister methods for creating submissions; the frontend uses these methods on form submit.
acceptanceCriteria: Two submission types are stored: inquiries and contributor applications.
Each stored record includes a created timestamp and the submitted fields.
Frontend can successfully submit both forms without errors.

requirements.text: Add a Portfolio section (Home preview) that presents a cinematic, national-agency feel using curated placeholder items (e.g., sports, brand, events) with consistent grayscale visuals and concise captions.
acceptanceCriteria: Portfolio preview shows multiple items with titles/captions and grayscale visuals.
Portfolio section styling matches the black/white high-end theme.

requirements.text: Add and render generated static image assets (stored under frontend/public/assets/generated) to support the cinematic black-and-white design, including a hero background and a small set of grayscale portfolio thumbnails.
acceptanceCriteria: Images are loaded as static assets from frontend/public/assets/generated (not served from the backend).
Home hero and portfolio preview visibly use the generated assets.

constraints: Do not modify files in frontend immutablePaths (frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui). Compose and extend using new components/pages instead.
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor (all logic in backend/main.mo).
No third-party authentication beyond Internet Identity (not required for this marketing site).
No external email/SMS/push integrations; contact/join submissions must be handled without SendGrid/Mailgun/SMTP/Twilio.
Use English for all user-facing website text.
nonGoals: Payment processing or booking checkout flow.
Social media API integrations (embedded feeds requiring APIs).
